definition: to peep/to peek/to act as voyeur

sentences.english: Hitchcock also got a perverse thrill out of taking audiences on a voyeuristic roller-coaster ride.
sentences.chinese: 希區柯克也有有害刺激的考慮受衆的偷窺過山車旅程。

sentences.english: My mind's eye, peeping through the window, backs off, fluttering under the awning.
sentences.chinese: 我的靈目透過窗縫偷窺，退後，翩躚於遮陽棚下。

sentences.english: Whenever you surf the Web, you leave yourself open to being snooped upon by web sites.
sentences.chinese: 當你在網上衝浪，你給自己打開的被偷窺後的網站。

sentences.english: Thee average snooper spends an hour and 15 minutes seeking out Christmas gifts.
sentences.chinese: 偷窺者們平均花費1小時15分鐘就能找到禮物。

sentences.english: These are what will draw people to the website and bring back visitors and voyeurs.
sentences.chinese: 這是什麼吸引人們對網站和帶回遊客和偷窺。

sentences.english: The police caught a Peeping Tom outside the woman's house last night.
sentences.chinese: 警方昨晚在那個女士的房子外抓住一個偷窺者。

sentences.english: The voyeur stayed behind the window of the girls' bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 那個偷窺狂站在女生浴室的窗戶旁邊。

sentences.english: Cryptography is the process of hiding or obfuscating data so prying eyes can’t understand it.
sentences.chinese: 加密是隱藏或混淆數據以避免被偷窺的過程。

sentences.english: I think he is one of these people who is a voyeur .
We can be sure there will be more "peeping Toms" in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以確信未來將會有更多的偷窺狂。

sentences.english: The court papers allege she may be a voyeur.
sentences.chinese: 法庭文件宣稱她可能是一個偷窺狂。

sentences.english: As a "peeping Tom", one ought to be satisfied this time.
sentences.chinese: 一個偷窺狂，這一次絕對有飽足欲。

sentences.english: So embarrassed, do you live peeper .
sentences.chinese: 如此狼狽，做了你生活的偷窺者。

sentences.english: The guy is a peeping Tom.
The average snooper spends an hour and 15 minutes seeking out Christmas gifts.
sentences.chinese: 偷窺者們平均花費1小時15分鐘就能找到禮物。

definition: to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
to gently caress and stroke/to pet/to fondle
to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
incoherent speech/to talk without rhyme or reason (idiom)
